title: Family, Friends, and FOES
body_text:
The MONEY!
Bring out the dough if you're feeling lucky for a 50/50 raffle! Two winners will be decided throughout the evening.
The MUSIC by
ECD's
-own C. Adams!
Family Affair III
event planner and legendary figure of the game, Christopher
Adams, has put his musical magic to work in compiling a special soundtrack for the event!
The MAIN EVENT: Sascha Basista vs. Joey Smalls!
Two close friends, two better enemies. It's the titanic-sized clash and you can trust that there's a unique, compelling story ...
The journey to
Family Affair III
begins all the way back to a chilly,
November 18, '06
night when a then-teenaged Basista entered the worshiped Wall High School battlegrounds. And a memorable debut indeed; some wicked dodges and the recipient of  "Fritz"-thrown bulletball put the youngster on the map. Just
one short week later
, Basista's buddy-turned-adversary, the equally-hungry Smalls, made his own splash.
Parts I and II
Basista-Smalls I
- Joey's inaugural event - was a war with casualties. The soon-to-be nicknamed "Eddie Gordo" was vanquished by his dance-dodging counterpart which sent Smalls packing for a lengthy hiatus. But
EastCoastDodgeball's
"writer" wisely scheduled a rematch in
January 2007
with "Gordo" extracting a measure of revenge in a physically-taxing brawl.
With this intense series tied at one apiece, the fate of their feud was mysteriously put on hold.
Reunited?
The duo briefly rekindled their bond when Basista called upon his "friend" in the fight against Gerald Lewis and the "BreakDancer's" arch rival at the time, Ray Marzarella,
later that year
. But the Basista-Smalls combination was a short-lived, one-hit wonder. The PondScum tandem easily disposed of their enemies and to this day, one could say the bad blood between the
Family Affair III
headliners still greatly exists.
The demise of
ECD's
weekly battles unfortunately prevented
Basista-Smalls III
from ever occurring .. until now.
The Final Encounter
Perhaps the two most energetic, charismatic, and certainly talented dodgeball warriors face-off in their feverishly-awaited third and final encounter.
Sascha "BreakDancin'" Basista
epically collides with
Joey "Gordo" Smalls
at the 3rd Annual
Family Affair
spectacular.
An event of this magnitude happens
only once
so best be sure you attend!
body_html:
The MONEY!
Bring out the dough if you're feeling lucky for a 50/50 raffle! Two winners will be decided throughout the evening.

The MUSIC by ECD's-own C. Adams!
Family Affair III event planner and legendary figure of the game, Christopher Adams, has put his musical magic to work in compiling a special soundtrack for the event!

The MAIN EVENT: Sascha Basista vs. Joey Smalls!
Two close friends, two better enemies. It's the titanic-sized clash and you can trust that there's a unique, compelling story ...

The journey to Family Affair III begins all the way back to a chilly, November 18, '06 night when a then-teenaged Basista entered the worshiped Wall High School battlegrounds. And a memorable debut indeed; some wicked dodges and the recipient of "Fritz"-thrown bulletball put the youngster on the map. Just one short week later, Basista's buddy-turned-adversary, the equally-hungry Smalls, made his own splash.

Parts I and II
Basista-Smalls I - Joey's inaugural event - was a war with casualties. The soon-to-be nicknamed "Eddie Gordo" was vanquished by his dance-dodging counterpart which sent Smalls packing for a lengthy hiatus. But EastCoastDodgeball's "writer" wisely scheduled a rematch in January 2007 with "Gordo" extracting a measure of revenge in a physically-taxing brawl.

With this intense series tied at one apiece, the fate of their feud was mysteriously put on hold.

Reunited?
The duo briefly rekindled their bond when Basista called upon his "friend" in the fight against Gerald Lewis and the "BreakDancer's" arch rival at the time, Ray Marzarella, later that year. But the Basista-Smalls combination was a short-lived, one-hit wonder. The PondScum tandem easily disposed of their enemies and to this day, one could say the bad blood between the Family Affair III headliners still greatly exists.

The demise of ECD's weekly battles unfortunately prevented Basista-Smalls III from ever occurring .. until now.

The Final Encounter
Perhaps the two most energetic, charismatic, and certainly talented dodgeball warriors face-off in their feverishly-awaited third and final encounter.

Sascha "BreakDancin'" Basista epically collides with Joey "Gordo" Smalls at the 3rd Annual Family Affair spectacular.

An event of this magnitude happens
only once so best be sure you attend!
